code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Railway as Railway Platform
    participant Main as main.py
    participant Lifespan as mongodb.py (FinTech_AuthVault)
    participant MongoDB as MongoDB

    Railway->>Main: Start container
    Main->>Lifespan: Enter lifespan context
    Lifespan->>MongoDB: Connect (FinTech_LedgerService)
    MongoDB-->>Lifespan: Connection established
    Lifespan->>MongoDB: Ping (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    MongoDB-->>Lifespan: Pong
    Lifespan->>Main: Attach app.mongodb, app.mongo_dal
    Main->>Main: Add CORS middleware
    Main->>Main: Include router
    Main-->>Railway: Server ready on 0.0.0.0:8000
